message.content:
Based on the content of the paper, the most likely category for this product is "Health & Personal Care" because it is a children's constipation relief product. 

The next likely category could be "Baby Products" since the product is specifically designed for children. 

The third likely category could be "Home & Kitchen" because the product is related to digestive health and can be used at home. 

The fourth likely category could be "Office Products" because the product is mentioned as being frustrated with the limited selection of products available, which could imply that it is related to office or work-related issues. 

The fifth likely category could be "Grocery & Gourmet Food" because the product is related to digestive health and can be used for dietary purposes.

Title: "Pedia-Lax Children's Liquid Glycerin Suppositories, 6-Count Boxes (Pack of 3)"
Content: Poop happens, but when it doesn’t, there’s Pedia-Lax. It’s the first line of products for regularity and constipation relief made just for kids by the No. 1 trusted name in laxatives. And now Pedia-Lax Probiotic Yums help maintain natural digestive balance. Moms told us they were frustrated with the limited selection of products available to help relieve their children’s constipation.
